entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make ChangeSignature command handler asynchronous and avoid expensive semantic operations on UI thread #62135
  • Enable updated escape rules if `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeFeature.ByRefFields` exists #62131
  • It seems like a syntax parser bug when combined `switch` statement and a wrong open square bracket `[` token #62126
    17.3
  • Report error if LifetimeAnnotationAttribute is used directly in source #62124
  • `UseSimpleUsingStatement` produces bad indentation #62123
  • Dereference of ref field should be emitted to IL even if value is ignored #62122
    17.4
  • PEFieldSymbol in VisualBasic should set RefKind and RefCustomModifiers for ref fields or include use-site diagnostic #62121
    17.4
  • Support ref field assignment in object initializers #62120
    17.4

Closed

  • Local functions don't give unreachability diagnostics #58304
    17.3
  • Add EditAndContinueMethodDebugInformation.Create overload that takes compressedStateMachineStateMap #61636
    17.3
  • Certain intermixes of braceless and braced usings seems to result in unbalanced try/finally sequence points #61119
    17.3
  • SourceGenerators Long Path issue when building in VS #48833
    17.3
  • resolve PROTOTYPE comments regarding target-typed conditional expression #46171
    17.3
  • Using a custom Interpolated String handler for logging may skip side effects #62128
  • Surface unused referenced assemblies to user as diagnostics #625
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.UnitTests.AttributeTests_CallerInfoAttributes.TestCallerFilePath2 is failing for CoreCLR in DefaultInterfaceImplementation branch possibly due to behavior change in CoreCLR #25882
    Compiler.Next
  • CodeLens showing incorrect user as author #62125
  • Wrong behavior of compiling for functions with nullable string return when nullable is enabled #62115

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle possible null symbols in `getAttributeTarget` #62137
    Area-Compilers
  • Separate out connection failures #62136
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure
  • Move to a shared stopwatch in the incremental generator #62134
    Area-Compilers
  • Pool arrays in the incremental generator #62132
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow to forward obsolete types without any diagnostics. #62127
    Area-Compilers
  • Exclude BCL libraries from Roslyn vsix #62119
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add members to PythiaCompletionProviderBase to move IntelliCode off internal APIs #62118
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62130
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #61669 from jasonmalinowski/log-aggregator… #62056
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Update tests to reflect BCL behavior changes #61456
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid cascading diagnostics on error base type #62087
    Area-Compilers
  • Address PROTOTYPE comments in features/ref-fields #62088
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • testing out caching common binary assets #62095
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix top-level activation for Move Static Members #62103
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Give member refactoring tools consistent field selection #62102
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix NRE in VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider #62075
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Don't load parts early from MEF that aren't needed #62090
    Area-IDE
  • Allow `delegate*<...>? ` to be scanned/parsed and add diagnostic to binder #62104
    Area-Compilers
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Assert diagnostics pass correct number of arguments #59419
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Issue/50181 #62101
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add prefer trailing commas code-style option #54859
    Area-IDE
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • Reuse incremental states from prior runs if they are unchanged #62116
    Area-Compilers
  • Verify files are saved after a save operation #62117
    Area-IDE
  • Support switch expression in CompleteStatementHandler #62114
    Area-IDE
  • Add `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` to `EqualityContract` property #61993
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add elastic space in IDE0063 codefix #59383
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers
